author: Dayle Shepherd
comment: I have owned a Sony Smart Watch 3 for a week now and have been looking for a simple but good looking and unique watch face since then...I found it with pop watch face.  lots of options for colour, look and feel to choose from and I'm pleased to say that my battery life hasn't been affected as others have reported. I charged my watch around 20 hours ago while using this face and still have 59% left now! I was a bit worried at first that the battery life would be negatively affected but clearly not an issue.  Looking forward to future updates :)

reply.author: Ikubyx
reply.content:
your review is a good boost for us, there is a lot of improvements on pop watch face scope, hope you will like all the coming versions.
Thank you

title: Great looking and performing watch face

author: Gautham Rajendran
comment: Really nice watch face. I usually only stick to the stock ones but this one is an exception. I love the sleek look and the customizable options available. Only issue that is very minor is that ever time I take my Moto 360 out of the charger, the options for the watchface screen comes up and I have to press the button to close it. Besides this, I highly recommend this
title: Sleek watchface!

author: Tytan McBride
comment: [UPDATE] Finally got it to install, and yeah it took a while for my watch to finally get it synced up, but it was worth the wait! Best watch-face available yet!  I've tried everything from restarting it and syncing the apps and it just isn't installing. I'll update this if it starts working!

reply.author: Ikubyx
reply.content: Hi, please verify that you have the 5.0.2 android version on you watch, you can also try to reinstall the face and resync apps, please email me i can help you to solve this issue

title: Once Working, Love It!

author: Andi Darmika
comment: I use Smartwatch 3, this watch face looks good on it. The color and B&W ambient mode is not working (always look plain white), is that SW3's limitation? or I configure something wrong? Please add option to disable the ticking square, on round watch it look good but on square watch not really.

reply.author: Ikubyx
reply.content:
Hi Andi, for the oled screens like SW3, on ambient mode we can only play with black&white colors, greyscale isn't supported, it's a limitation that can improve battery life.
for the option to disable ticking it will be published on the next update
Thanks for the review

title: looks good

author: Muhammad Syamim
comment: The first time I saw this watch face was by someone from Oh! Media (Malaysia blog).. I just fall in love with this watch face.. I was looking for it since last 5 months, asking Android Authority, Oh! Media, my friends who used Moto 360 (I thought it's Moto 360 stock watch face) if they knew about this watch face.. But no one reply me.. And just a few days ago, as I was looking for a new watch faces, I bumped into this perfect watch face.. Quickly I registered my card and buy this watch face app. Thank you..
title: My searching ends here..

author: Mike Jackowski
comment: I find myself using this watch face the most on my moto 360 and it has worked out great! However, could the color change menu be a scroll menu instead of a tap to change? It becomes tedious to cycle through the options. Fix that, and it'll be perfect in my eyes!
title: Awesome watch face

comment: I'm really picky and couldn't find a single watch face that I really liked until I found this one. I like the simplicity and font style. The only thing that would make it better is if it could show a random color on a dark background each time I checked my watch.
title: I'm in love with this watch face!

author: Imran Shafie
comment: I've used this face the most versus the others, for the fact that it tells you what you need to know at a glance. Dates in faces (minus the full on customisable ones like Facer) are uncommon in the Store, and this is a great thing to have. For an experience the developer wants you to have, this is the best out there.
title: Amazing.

author: Harrison Weber
comment: I really liked this one as a simple colourful watch face. Only reason it didn't get 5 stars was the battery and date indicators are too small. An option to make them bigger would be great.
title: Great simple watch face

author: Jacob Bridenbecker
comment: Looks awesome, has plenty of options, uses more battery than the default faces, but not significantly. The minutes get covered up by notifs though
title: Overall pretty great

author: Edward Cox
comment: Using as a daily driver, love this watch face. Very stylish and great options. The only thing that could be improved is the "smooth" second bar, it certainly could be smoother. Just a minor gripe.

author: Mike Venegas
comment: This watch face ruined all other watch faces for me , now this is the only one I use and can't find any other  face to replace it yet!
title: Love this watchface!

author: Karl Konopka
comment: Cool looking app with a retro feel. Only suggestion would be to add the battery life of your phone as well. Didn't realize how much I used it on other watch faces.

reply.author: Ikubyx
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback, your request is very relevant and will be published in the next version

title: Cool design

author: Shiraz Siddiqui
comment: I installed it but initially couldn't figure out how to customize... apparently you can tap on the face when you're in change face mode on your watch and there's a settings button. Clear instructions are needed I'd say in the details. But I've had a slight reduction in battery of almost 10-15%. My Moto 360 now lasts a couple hours less at the end of the day... not sure why, maybe the "smooth" second animation or using color in ambient mode

reply.author: Ikubyx
reply.content: YES! you are right, i'll change the face description in this sens, thanks for your review, for battery life the smooth effect on seconds and using numbers color in ambient mode will affect slightly the battery life, i use personaly a completly white or black&white numbers on ambien mode

title: Figured out how to customize, but slight battery drain :-/

author: Carter Garcia-Kimura
comment: the battery life is abysmal. I was happy to finally be able to install it, but once I did, it burned through 30% battery in under half an hour.

reply.author: Ikubyx
reply.content:
Try restarting the watch, sometimes the first use of the face generate this issue, and be carful when using smooth effect, colors on ambient mode,
generaly the battery consumption is good

title: Looks great, but

author: Jordan Wires
comment: Keep colors feature does not work with new moto 360 second gen. Waiting for an update to fix this and make a little faster. Overall good face. Please fix.
title: Great features but needs update moto 360

author: kevin miller
comment: This watch face is awesome because it's stylish! it actually looks great on my Samsung Gear Live's square screen and the colors shine through well in sunlight while I was walking. This watch face comes with MANY options to change it's functionality and appearance, I prefer to have all options on, including battery life, and the date !  I like the default white text on the ambient screen, makes it easy to see in most lighting conditions. Great face added to my collection!

author: adiThya kauShik
comment: Beautiful watch face, with a large list of beautiful dazzling color options. I only wish it had the option of larger font size for the date and battery %age. With that fix/option, this would be a 5star face.
title: Simple and Elegant

author: Herman Tsang
comment: I installed the watch face, but unable to find it either on phone and on the watch... Would like to seek help. My watch versiin 5.1.1
title: Unable to find the app..

author: Andrei Muntean
comment: The watch face didn't work at first but after getting the update it kinda rebooted and started working perfectly. I definitely recommend this watch face to anyone as it is really customizable and also really nice looking.

reply.author: Ikubyx
reply.content:
Hi Andrei, from where did you try to set the watch face?, android wear app or directly from your watch? plz email me i'll help you to set up the face.
thanks

title: Fixed after update

author: Ian Weng
comment: 90% of the watch face I downloaded I ended up getting a refund or delete it right away after I tried, but not this one! Trendy and unique design, looks fantastic on the 2nd gen moto 360. It's gonna be on my watch permanently now :) thanks you! Hope to see more of your watch face soon in the future.
title: One of the absolute best looking watch face!

author: Alfinza Raendina
comment: I don't know where can i find this watchface. No icon in app drawer either in Android wear. Please help
title: I can't use this watchface

author: Dominic Joy
comment: Really like this watch face, just hoping it doesnt drain the battery. Would also like the option to remove the seconds from around the edge. Maybe to increase the size of the time as well. Thanks

author: Justin Rajewski
comment: I love the watch face but would like the ability to set how notifications show (big/small/transparent) as the default of not transparent is annoying since it covers the time.

author: George Hall
comment: This has been my go-to watch face for AGES! I sometimes change to another but then five minutes later I am back at this one. Highly recommend if you're looking for a nice and simple, minimalistic watch face.

author: David Harrall
comment: I really love this watch face. My only suggestion would be to add the option for the peek cards to be translucent so they don't hide the time.
title: Awesome

author: Jeromy Green
comment: I recommend definitely if you're looking for something simple yet customizable. Looks amazing on LG watch R
title: Best digital watchface in the market

author: Kevin Newton
comment: Sleek and stylish watch face. But I have uninstalled the app because the Ambient mode/Keep colors or B&W colors option doesn't seem to be working on my Moto 360 2nd gen. Please fix this!!
title: Sleek & stylish

author: Juhani Törmänen
comment: This is the watch face I always put on when I hit the night clubs =) would love a feature where you could define two or more main colors according to your clothing =)
title: Best party watch face found so far! =)

author: Mark Tadong
comment: It has a nice ands stylish look to it. I would prefer it to have an option for battery life and date in ambient mode. If you add that, if would be perfect and I will update review to 5 star.
title: Almost perfect

author: Tim Wolf
comment: Why does this watch face not show up on my watch? Ever since 2.0 allot of faces don't work. Please fix.

author: Christopher Turner
comment: Love the design. I do wish the date was bigger with the ability to see it in ambient mode though.
title: My new favorite watch face

author: Kendy Nguyen
comment: The watch face looks fantastic on the moto 360, but I am unable to change the always on display settings. No matter what I select it goes monochrome on standby.

author: Luke Krentz
comment: Very nice watch face, though I do have to complain that the setting to keep colors on ambient mode doesn't work on my moto 360 second gen. No matter which setting I put it on, it switches the colors to white while on ambient mode.

author: Angel Velasquez
comment: So loving the style of this face. If I had more thumbs I'd give it more than just two thumbs up
title: Loveded it

author: Eddie Garcia
comment: omg it would be so awesome if you guys also made a theme for custom launchers, that way the watch and phone can be truly in sync
title: LOVE IT!!!

comment: Won't even let me "install the settings app"

reply.author: Ikubyx
reply.content:
Please email me i can help you to solve this issue
Thks

title: Horrible

author: Erick Ramirez
comment: Minimal, sleek and smooth! I like the almost stock feel it has to it.
title: Looks awesome!

author: Sachin Umashankar
comment: Really cool design. Wish it was updated to support higher DPI watches available now.. The text is too small to read :/

author: Tyler Haddad
comment: Absolutely stunning. Love the format, colors, and customization options. Especially love the date and battery level being on the face. Excellent work!!!
title: Beautiful watch face!
